com.digev.mp.component

Interface IComponentFactory

  • Deprecated. 
    Please see HandlerFactory.

    public interface IComponentFactory
    This is the interface that factories for specific components will implement. The interface is designed to be backward compatible with the way that compoents have traditionally been created and initialized, using a DOM element. Implementations of this interface will be used through the IoC framework to set up the available managament point components.
